sentence: In Ohio, Rep. Tim Ryan is well positioned to win the Democratic nomination for an open Senate seat with a message appealing to centrist, blue collar workers that is in line with Biden’s overall approach.
author: Zeke Miller
title: Biden’s election year challenge: Blame GOP for nation’s woes
